summary: A wax museum hires a writer to give the sculptures stories. The writer imagines himself and the museum owner's daughter in the stories.
cast: Emil Jannings|Conrad Veidt|Werner Krauss|William Dieterle|Olga Belajeff|Paul Biensfeldt|John Gottowt|Georg John|Ernst Legal
keywords: expressionism|jack the ripper character|psychotronic film|ivan the terrible character|silent film
title: El hombre de las figuras de cera
